General.Name: Jiajia Food Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiajia Food Group Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, production, and marketing of condiment food products in China. It offers soy sauces, vinegar, chicken essence, monosodium glutamate, oyster sauce, cooking wine, vegetable oils, compound seasonings, noodles, and hot pot sauces. Jiajia Food Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Changsha, China.
General.Address: Economic and Technological Dev Zone, Changsha, China, 410600
